did.unittitle: Frank P. Jones, Alexander Technique Collection - no longer at DCA

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: This collection is no longer at Tufts or the Digital Collections and Archives. It was on deposit with Tufts and has been RETURNED to the Alexander Association of New England.
Contact information for the Association as of April 2002 is as follows:
Theodore Diamond, Jr. 737 Park Avenue Apt. 9A New York, NY 10021 theodorediamond@msn.com 347-234-1391

processinfo.head: Processing status
processinfo.p: This collection is minimally processed and may not be available for research
